verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye <S%H2063>this,<s%> O <S%H3548>priests;<s%> and <S%H7181>hearken,<s%> ye <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and give ye <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is toward you, <S%H3588>because<s%> ye have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> on <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and a <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor.<s%>
And the <S%H7846>revolters<s%> are <S%H6009>profound<s%> to make <S%H7819>slaughter,<s%> though <S%H589>I<s%> have been a <S%H4148>rebuker<s%> of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3582>hid<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> thou committest <S%H2181>whoredom,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

They will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>frame<s%> their <S%H4611>doings<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of them, and they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> doth <S%H6030>testify<s%> to his <S%H6440>face:<s%> therefore shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H3782>fall<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them.

They shall <S%H1980>go<s%> with their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and with their <S%H1241>herds<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> but they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him; he hath <S%H2502>withdrawn<s%> himself <S%H4480>from<s%> them.

They have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H3205>begotten<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> them <S%H854>with<s%> their <S%H2506>portions.<s%>

Blow <S%H8628><s%> ye the <S%H7782>cornet<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpet<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah:<s%> cry <S%H7321>aloud<s%> at <S%H1007>Beth-aven,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee, O <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8047>desolate<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H8433>rebuke:<s%> among the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have I made <S%H3045>known<s%> that which shall surely <S%H539>be.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> like them that <S%H5253>remove<s%> the <S%H1366>bound:<s%> therefore I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them like <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H7533>broken<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H2974>willingly<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6673>commandment.<s%>
Therefore will <S%H589>I<s%> be unto <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> as a <S%H6211>moth,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as <S%H7538>rottenness.<s%>

When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H853>saw<s%> his <S%H4205>wound,<s%> then <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb:<s%> yet <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7495>heal<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1455>cure<s%> <S%H4480><s%> you of your <S%H4205>wound.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will be unto <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> as a <S%H7826>lion,<s%> and as a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> even <S%H589>I,<s%> will <S%H2963>tear<s%> and go <S%H1980>away;<s%> I will take <S%H5375>away,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H5337>rescue<s%> him.

I will <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H834><s%> they acknowledge their <S%H816>offense,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H6440>face:<s%> in their <S%H6862>affliction<s%> they will seek me <S%H7836>early.<s%>
